document_data.name: Galandro Luna
document_data.mainbody: '''Galandro Luna''' was a performer who lived in the [[Sword Coast North]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Galandro's greatest joy in life was seeing joy in the audiences for whom he performed. While he was a skilled musician, Galandro was also quite adept at dishing out insults. He had a good sense of humor and did not mind them returned in kind.
document_data.Possessions: His most beloved item was his [[fiddle]], which was given to him as a gift by a dear friend.
document_data.Activities: Galandro's aim in life was to become famous and earn great acclaim as a musician. He would do just about anything to achieve this goal.
